trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a method of either an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> object is called that is incompatible with the current state of the object.
trans-unit.target: 当下列任一工具的方法时引发的异常<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>对象称为与对象的当前状态不兼容。

trans-unit.source: For example, this exception is thrown if the **CancelAsync** method of either object is called when the object is not performing an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果引发此异常**CancelAsync**对象未执行异步写操作时调用任一对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref>提供特定的错误条件的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref> class that provides specific <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref>提供特定的类<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 需序列化或反序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The context, which includes source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 上下文，其中包括源和目标的序列化流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition and includes the cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref>提供特定的错误情况并包括导致异常的类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsWriterException"></xref>.
